title: directx error pls help me
body: i can not enter the game it crashes everytime and says something about directX error pls help me . i already tried everything to fix this error

replies.body: This error usually happens from bad drivers or even hardware failure.  Your best bet is to go over the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to update your drivers and resolve whatever is causing the error.  Hopefully, it will do the trick!
